channel.title: Azure Enterprise App on Home
channel.description: Recent content in Azure Enterprise App on Home

item.title: Update Apple SCIM Token
item.description: What is SCIM? Meaning: SCIM (System for Cross-domain Identity Management) Purpose: SCIM allows organisations to provision Managed Apple IDs immediately and to combine Apple School Manager or Apple Business Manager properties (such as SIS username and grade levels for Apple School Manager and roles) over account data imported from Azure AD.
